element.headline: Digital Marketing | Web Developer
element.about:
Marketing and Communication professional specialized in Web Development. 
I focus on designing optimized websites that increase visibility and conversion for businesses and personal ventures.
I combine my experience in Digital Marketing with Web Development to analyze the specific needs of each company and sector, ensuring that every project reflects the brand's values.
If you’re looking to create an impactful website or a landing page for your next marketing campaign, I would love to help you achieve that. Feel free to reach out and let’s get started!

My GitHub profile:
https://github.com/ariana-luz
element.topSkills: Digital Marketing • Web Content Management • Web Analytics • HTML Emails • Social Media

experience.description:
- Design and development of landing pages: Creation of visually appealing and functional landing pages, optimized for conversion and aligned with the brand image.
- Ad design for Instagram and Facebook: Production of impactful creatives tailored to each platform, aimed at capturing the target audience's attention.
- Planning and execution of social media campaigns: End-to-end management of campaigns in Meta Business Manager, including audience segmentation, objective setting, and performance analysis to maximize return on investment (ROI).

- Websites and landing pages design.
- Mobile website optimization.
- Integration with marketing tools.
- Custom Google Analytics settings.

experience.companyName: Institute of Telecommunications and Multimedia Applications (iTEAM)
experience.description: Support in the preparation of all the documentation, administrative activities related to the projects; soport in business exploitation, innovation activities, communication and dissemination activities.

experience.companyName: Penguin Random House Grupo Editorial | Argentina
experience.description:
- Management of processes and pre-production workflows for audiobooks.
- Collaboration with several divisions, including production, editing, design, administration, metadata, and digital operations.
- Catalog review in all formats, management, and tracking of audiobook scheduling.
- Collaborate in developing the audiobook editorial plan.
- Management and implementation of all audiobooks produced by the regional team.
- Compilation and verification of the documentation and materials required to initiate each project.
- Administrative tasks for product setup and system loading.
- Management and creation of materials in SAP and editorial metadata in audiobooks.
- Budget management and recording in SAP and PowerBI.
- Collaboration with producers and technicians to optimize production times.
- Collaboration and support for various departments involved in production.
- Administrative tasks and reporting related to the audio team.

Assistance in B2B and B2C business management.

- Management of internal and external communications of the company.

headline: Senior Clinical Data Scientist at Syneos Health
about:
I am Pharmacist with 20 years of experience in Clinical Research (Data and Clinical Operations) working for Pharmaceutical Companies and CROs.

I have experience as Project Manager in Data Operations, managing resources, coordinating team activities, supervising deadlines and quality of Clinical Milestones. Good interpersonal and communication skills with the internal and external clients. 

I have also experience in Clinical Operations as CRA in the full clinical development process, regulatory submissions, Site Initiations, ongoing and Close out visits, Investigator Payments, and Site Issues Follow up.

I like to work independent, with challenging projects.

experience.location: Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España

experience.companyName: Strategic Solutions Division of PRA Health Sciences
experience.description:
• Project Management: Serve as primary point of contact for Sponsor on data management deliverables. Establish strong communication with DM, Leads, Client Managers and stakeholders.
• Oversee DM tasks, project milestones, deadlines, issues resolution. Supporting and mentoring DM activities as needed. 
• Manage continuous process improvements, quality performance; serve as escalation point for unresolved data issues. Reviewer of documentation compliance and archiving for Start up, in-life and DB lock.
• Workload projections, metrics evaluation, and training compliance.
• Perform Annual Employee Performance Evaluations. 
• Conduct interview and selection process for new staff. 
• Prepare and present Study Material at client meetings and communicates outcomes to project team.

•	Remote clinical monitoring tasks and remote visits for Latin America Countries. 
•	Participate in Sponsor Meetings with Clinical Lead.
•	Support and back up Clinical Lead to follow up topics with internal areas and with clinical sites.
•	Patient enrolment and issues management.
•	Protocol, ICF and Contract amendments.
•	Regulatory process (PI and Committee submissions, approvals) after Site Initiation.
•	Drugs and supplies management.
•	CRF management: site account management, oversees site data entry, and query resolution (Inform, Medidata RAVE, Oracle RDC). 
•	Vendors: site account management, query resolution, issues follow up (IVRS/ Perceptive / ERT / Cardinal Health, Clinphone)

•	Perform initiation, monitoring and close out on site visits according to Study Protocols and current Regulations.
•	Submission and follow up of regulatory package and regulatory activities to MOH, IEC and Local Committees.
•	Supervise SAE reporting and follow up of site issues. 
•	Clinical Medication and Supplies site management.
•	Payments process.
•	Protocols: Cardiovascular, Oncology and Hepatitis.

•	Lead worldwide Medical Coding activities for Safety (Pharmacovigilance) and Clinical Databases (Clinical Data management)
•	Tracking and metrics of Argentinean Team 
•	Planning, assignment, follow up and evaluation of Argentinean Team objectives and goals.
•	Subject Matter Expert for Medical Coding for Global Company from Jan 2006.
•	Supervise SAE reconciliation and SAE reporting listings worldwide.
•	Writing of Medical Coding SOPs for Global Clinical and Global Pharmacovigilance.
•	Member of Global SOP Committee, reviewing all procedures from GCDM and other related areas for Committee discussion.

•	Start up, clean up and lock of Clinical Studies (Hepatitis and Cardiovascular). 
•	Database UAT
•	Setting of DB specifications and discrepancy management.
•	Data management plan: to keep updated according to team meetings.
•	SAE reconciliation: to work with Clinical and Pharmacovigilance Team.
•	CRF: Paper (Clintrial) and EDC (Inform).

•	Evaluation of stability and chemical behavior of Drugs in Clinical Phases. 
•	Validation of analytical technical procedures. 
•	Writing of SOPs related to Stability of Clinical Drugs.
•	Internal Audit Group (Quality Audit preparation). 
•	Laboratory results Data Base (SQL*LIMS).

positions: Endorsed by 2 colleagues at PRA Health Sciences

headline: Architect & Interior Designer
about: Arquitecta interiorista con experiencia en dibujo técnico, modelado y renderizado 3D. A lo largo de mi carrera, he cultivado un enfoque centrado en el cliente, combinando habilidades en la elaboración de presupuestos y una coordinación eficaz con proveedores. Me apasiona el manejo de redes sociales y la fotografía arquitectónica y comercial, lo que me permite comunicar visualmente mis proyectos de manera atractiva. Soy extrovertida, con una sólida capacidad para trabajar en equipo, siempre dispuesta a enfrentar nuevos retos. Estoy comprometida con crear espacios que inspiren y mejoren la calidad de vida de las personas.
topSkills: SketchUp • Visualización en 3D • Revit • Adobe Photoshop • Fotografía digital

experience.description: Diseño residencial, retail y hosteleria. Contacto constante con clientes y proveedores. Presupuestos. Manejo de almacén. Gestión de proyectos.

Diseño de interiores de torre residencial premium de gran escala, desarrollo de hall, pileta, spa, quinchos y espacios comunes. Búsqueda de materialidades visitando diferentes proveedores y comunicación con cliente. Participación en legajo constructivo de Instituto Modelo Legal Forense (Documentación Revit) Además de coordinación con técnicos afines.

Project Delivery en gran escala. (Revu Bluebeam y Revit) . Trabajo 
colaborativo con otros arquitectos, coordinación con consultores 
de instalaciones, estructuras e interiores. Documentación técnica y 
modelado 3D. Legajos técnicos según el Código de Construcción 
EE.UU “IBC”.

Dibujo y diseño de instalaciones 2D y 3D en baja, media y gran 
escala (Revit MEP). Renderizados a pedido de clientes, interiores 
y exteriores. (SketchUP + Lumion)

Dibujo y reelevamiento 2D y 3D, para actualización de planos de la 
estancia. Propuestas paisajistas para espacios exteriores.
(SketchUP y AutoCAD)

Dibujante CAD y renderista. Desarrollo y diseño de dos publicaciones
editoriales Revista SA, Salta Arquitectura #40. Producción de 
contenido gráfico y técnico. (AutoCAD, SketchUP, Photoshop, Lumion)

headline: Cloud Architect | Telecommunications & Software Engineer | DevOps Engineer | Technical Leader | Full-stack Developer | AWS, Microservices, TypeScript, NodeJS & Go
about: Driven Telecommunications Engineer with a foundation in economics, a passion for software architecture, and designing products that align technical vision with strategic objectives. Expertise in taking products from ideation to market and cloud-based architectures.
topSkills: Engineering • Software Design • Software Development • Leadership • Business Process Improvement

experience.description: Engineer at Mercadona Tech working on the eCommece project for Mercadona S.A., Spain’s leading supermarket chain. I ensure the online storefront and backend infrastructure, from catalog and CMS services to integrations with payments, logistics and inventory, operate at full 100% uptime readiness. A platform that generated around €842 million in online revenue in 2024 and supports tens of thousands of orders daily, I collaborate across cross-functional teams to build robust, scalable systems that enable millions of households to shop seamlessly every day.

Designed, maintained, and optimized the global backend platform supporting Burger King, Popeyes, Firehouse Subs, and Tim Hortons, handling millions of requests per second across multiple countries. Focused on high availability, scalability, and cost efficiency, ensuring seamless operations, streamlined releases, and reduced platform costs while supporting continuous global expansion.

Led the development and optimization of a high-scale loyalty platform supporting Burger King, Popeyes, Firehouse Subs, and Tim Hortons worldwide. Engineered solutions to handle millions of requests per second, ensuring reliability, performance, and seamless customer experiences across global markets.
Collaborated on a cutting-edge, global platform for renowned restaurant brands. Adapted development approaches for international releases and contributed new features within an agile environment.

Collaborated with financial experts and an amazing small team of engineers to design and deliver a valuation and legal management platform for a comprehensive financial services provider, specializing in valuation, performance management, domestic and international tax advisory, wealth structuring and corporate finance.

Owned the full development lifecycle of a management, logistics, and monitoring platform for Argentina's leading agribusiness complex, Aceitera General Deheza. Guided the project from design through implementation in close collaboration with the client.

Collaborated on the design and development of a mobile application to track attendance for the American Chamber of Commerce in Argentina (AmCham) public events, assisting in the implementation of features to streamline event check-in and registration processes. Worked closely with the team to ensure a seamless user experience and data accuracy while integrating the application with existing AmCham systems to enhance functionality and efficiency.
Contributed to a large-scale, white-label financial and educational platform for universities, collaborating with an international team to develop new features using Angular and .NET.
Worked as an intern in IT support at Blas Pascal University while pursuing my degree. Diagnosed and resolved technical issues in a university environment.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Engineering Manager | Softwafe Engineer | Typescript | NodeJs | AWS
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: March 17, 2025, Juan Martin managed Francisco directly
receivedRecommendations.description:
Francisco is, without a doubt, one of the most exceptional Software Engineers I've had the pleasure of working alongside. He's not just a coder; he's a true architect of solutions. You throw a complex problem at him, and he'll not only solve it, but do so with elegance and efficiency. His expertise across AWS, Terraform, Node.js, React, and everything in between is truly impressive. And he communicates it all with crystal-clear English, which is a huge asset.

What really stands out about Francisco is his leadership, even as a Software Engineer. He's the guy people naturally gravitate towards when they need help. He stepped up big time during a recent team transition, handling critical issues and making sure everyone was supported. 

Despite working remotely, he made the effort to connect with the team in person during every team building, which speaks volumes about his commitment. And he's always willing to mentor others and contribute to team growth. He's genuinely invested in the success of the people around him. Francisco's drive to learn, his positive attitude, and his sheer technical talent make him an absolute rockstar. If you're looking for a Software Engineer who's not only brilliant but also a fantastic teammate, Francisco is amazing :)

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Principal Engineer / AWS Architect / Technical Lead specialized in Large scale systems, AI, MLOps and DevOps • Ex-Meta • Contractor • Consultant

receivedRecommendations.description:
I've worked with Francisco on both product and large scale infrastructure challenges, and he's one of the rare engineers who can truly bridge the gap between the two. He gets the big picture on how tech decisions impact users and business goals, but he can also dive deep into the internals of scaling and reliability.

Francisco is a proactive engineer. He identifies and fixes issues before they escalate and he does it with a pragmatic approach that keeps projects moving forward without unnecessary complexity.

Francisco is that type of engineer that learns in 1 year what others do in many years. He's a very fast learner and always surprised me with his extensive knowledge across so many topics.

I enjoyed working with Francisco, as he's a very reliable engineer and brings a lot of value to every initiative he works on.

element.about: Driven Telecommunications Engineer with a foundation in economics, a passion for software architecture, and designing products that align technical vision with strategic objectives. Expertise in taking products from ideation to market and cloud-based architectures.
element.topSkills: Engineering • Software Design • Software Development • Leadership • Business Process Improvement

experience.description: Engineer at Mercadona Tech working on the eCommece project for Mercadona S.A., Spain’s leading supermarket chain. I ensure the online storefront and backend infrastructure, from catalog and CMS services to integrations with payments, logistics and inventory, operate at full 100% uptime readiness. A platform that generated around €842 million in online revenue in 2024 and supports tens of thousands of orders daily, I collaborate across cross-functional teams to build robust, scalable systems that enable millions of households to shop seamlessly every day.

Designed, maintained, and optimized the global backend platform supporting Burger King, Popeyes, Firehouse Subs, and Tim Hortons, handling millions of requests per second across multiple countries. Focused on high availability, scalability, and cost efficiency, ensuring seamless operations, streamlined releases, and reduced platform costs while supporting continuous global expansion.

Led the development and optimization of a high-scale loyalty platform supporting Burger King, Popeyes, Firehouse Subs, and Tim Hortons worldwide. Engineered solutions to handle millions of requests per second, ensuring reliability, performance, and seamless customer experiences across global markets.
Collaborated on a cutting-edge, global platform for renowned restaurant brands. Adapted development approaches for international releases and contributed new features within an agile environment.

Collaborated with financial experts and an amazing small team of engineers to design and deliver a valuation and legal management platform for a comprehensive financial services provider, specializing in valuation, performance management, domestic and international tax advisory, wealth structuring and corporate finance.

Owned the full development lifecycle of a management, logistics, and monitoring platform for Argentina's leading agribusiness complex, Aceitera General Deheza. Guided the project from design through implementation in close collaboration with the client.

Collaborated on the design and development of a mobile application to track attendance for the American Chamber of Commerce in Argentina (AmCham) public events, assisting in the implementation of features to streamline event check-in and registration processes. Worked closely with the team to ensure a seamless user experience and data accuracy while integrating the application with existing AmCham systems to enhance functionality and efficiency.
Contributed to a large-scale, white-label financial and educational platform for universities, collaborating with an international team to develop new features using Angular and .NET.
Worked as an intern in IT support at Blas Pascal University while pursuing my degree. Diagnosed and resolved technical issues in a university environment.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Engineering Manager | Softwafe Engineer | Typescript | NodeJs | AWS
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: March 17, 2025, Juan Martin managed Francisco directly
receivedRecommendations.description:
Francisco is, without a doubt, one of the most exceptional Software Engineers I've had the pleasure of working alongside. He's not just a coder; he's a true architect of solutions. You throw a complex problem at him, and he'll not only solve it, but do so with elegance and efficiency. His expertise across AWS, Terraform, Node.js, React, and everything in between is truly impressive. And he communicates it all with crystal-clear English, which is a huge asset.

What really stands out about Francisco is his leadership, even as a Software Engineer. He's the guy people naturally gravitate towards when they need help. He stepped up big time during a recent team transition, handling critical issues and making sure everyone was supported. 

Despite working remotely, he made the effort to connect with the team in person during every team building, which speaks volumes about his commitment. And he's always willing to mentor others and contribute to team growth. He's genuinely invested in the success of the people around him. Francisco's drive to learn, his positive attitude, and his sheer technical talent make him an absolute rockstar. If you're looking for a Software Engineer who's not only brilliant but also a fantastic teammate, Francisco is amazing :)

headline: People Operations | Executive Assistant | Office Manager |  Operations | Administrative Assistant | Virtual Assistant | Project Management | Dentist
about:
Hi! I’m a People Operations and Administration professional with experience in fast-paced startups and international teams. I make work easier, more human, and more efficient — from helping new hires feel welcome to organizing fun and meaningful team experiences.

I’ve supported cross-functional teams (marketing, engineering, customer service) and worked directly with CEOs and CTOs. I’ve created and led remote team events across 5+ time zones — including virtual dinners, full working weeks, and monthly off-sites — all designed to build team connection on a budget. I also planned over 15 internal events that boosted employee engagement.

I ensure payroll is processed on time to support finance deadlines, and I manage tools like Vanta to maintain SOC 2 compliance. I enjoy creating systems that help teams focus on what they do best.

Tools I use daily include G-Suite, Jira, Trello, Zoom, Slack, Docusign, Bill.com, and Vanta. I also support recruiting tasks like candidate coordination and onboarding, always aiming to give a smooth and professional experience.

I love learning, organizing, and solving everyday problems. I enjoy improving workflows, helping others, and being part of a team that values communication and collaboration.

Based in Valencia, I’m open to remote, hybrid, or on-site roles.
Feel free to reach out if you’d like to connect or work together!
topSkills: Communication • Teamwork • Recruiting • Soft Skills • Microsoft Office

experience.description:
• Led daily operations by coordinating calendars, meetings, and managing team equipment across distributed teams. Ensured seamless virtual day-to-day office tasks.

• Managed onboarding and offboarding for employees and contractors across multiple countries, maintaining confidential records and ensuring a smooth employee lifecycle.

• Processed payroll and compensation accurately and on time, including expense tracking, invoicing, and vendor negotiations to support finance goals.

• Planned and executed over 15 team-building events, both virtual and in-person, enhancing engagement and cross-team connection across time zones. Led All Hands meetings.

• Handled budgets and logistics for gifts and shipments, ensuring cost-effective purchases and timely global delivery. Communicate professionally with clients, owners, and service providers

• Provided HR and administrative support, including maintaining filing systems, organizing documents, reports and supporting compliance tasks.

• Utilized HR and productivity tools daily, such as Confluence, Jira, Google Sheets, Culture Amp, Google Workspace, Bonusly, Loom, Docusign, Bill.com, Canva, Zoom, Instagram, Trello, Claude, ChatGPT and Slack.

• Assisted in employee engagement programs, including recognition platforms, pulse surveys, and feedback initiatives, contributing to a 10% increase in participation.

• Demonstrated proactive problem-solving and organizational skills, improving internal processes and reducing response times.

• Coordinated event logistics, including vendor communication, catering, scheduling, and international travel arrangements, ensuring seamless execution.

•  Support management with executive and operational tasks. Strong organizational skills and attention to detail. Ability to manage multiple tasks independently and efficiently

- Supported sales team with client outreach and initial prospect research.
- Used Apollo.io for lead sourcing and CRM updates.
- Helped organize tasks and track progress using ClickUp.
- Assisted with administrative follow-up and coordination for potential clients.

experience.companyName: Ministerio de Salud de la Provincia de Santa Fe
experience.description:
Primary health attention in general and in the penitentiary system.

- Provided primary health care, focusing on prevention and treatment of oral diseases.
- Managed dental emergencies and performed necessary interventions.
- Conducted dental procedures, including fillings, extractions, and restorative treatments.
- Endodontics and exodontics, performing root canals and tooth extractions.
- Led community health promotion activities, educating on oral hygiene and prevention.
- Provided pediatric dental care, delivering specialized treatment to minors.
- Delivered comprehensive dental care at the former Institute of Adolescent Rehabilitation in Rosario (IRAR), improving the oral health of incarcerated youth.

I helped to organize two events that the company needed to strengthen the team and make the company known. My tasks were to make reservations of physical spaces, management of food budgets, scheduling events, among others. Office management.

receivedRecommendations.givenAt: April 25, 2025, Paula worked with Georgina on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
Georgina and I had the opportunity to work together at BoostUp and I can confidently say she’s one of those rare people who brings both heart and structure to everything she touches. She played a key role in making our fast-paced, remote team feel connected, supported, and genuinely happy — no small feat across multiple time zones!

Whether she was onboarding a new teammate, organizing a company-wide event, or jumping in to streamline processes, Georgina always led with empathy, a positive attitude, and a strong sense of ownership. She's incredibly proactive — she doesn’t wait to be asked, she anticipates needs and moves quickly to make things better for everyone.

What really stands out about Georgina is her ability to balance the people side of operations with the practical, detail-driven aspects. From handling payroll and compliance tools like Vanta to coordinating internal events that actually made people excited to log on — she truly does it all with a smile.

Any team would be lucky to have her energy, her care for people, and her get-it-done mindset. If you're looking for someone who lifts teams up while keeping operations running smoothly, Georgina’s your person.

Tools I use daily include G-Suite, Jira, Trello, Zoom, Slack, Docusign, Bill.com, and Vanta. I also support recruiting tasks like candidate coordination and onboarding, always aiming to give a smooth and professional experience.

I love learning, organizing, and solving everyday problems. I enjoy improving workflows, helping others, and being part of a team that values communication and collaboration.

Based in Valencia, I’m open to remote, hybrid, or on-site roles.
Feel free to reach out if you’d like to connect or work together!

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Technical Program Manager
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: April 25, 2025, Paula worked with Georgina on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
Georgina and I had the opportunity to work together at BoostUp and I can confidently say she’s one of those rare people who brings both heart and structure to everything she touches. She played a key role in making our fast-paced, remote team feel connected, supported, and genuinely happy — no small feat across multiple time zones!

Whether she was onboarding a new teammate, organizing a company-wide event, or jumping in to streamline processes, Georgina always led with empathy, a positive attitude, and a strong sense of ownership. She's incredibly proactive — she doesn’t wait to be asked, she anticipates needs and moves quickly to make things better for everyone.

What really stands out about Georgina is her ability to balance the people side of operations with the practical, detail-driven aspects. From handling payroll and compliance tools like Vanta to coordinating internal events that actually made people excited to log on — she truly does it all with a smile.

Any team would be lucky to have her energy, her care for people, and her get-it-done mindset. If you're looking for someone who lifts teams up while keeping operations running smoothly, Georgina’s your person.

headline: BI Engineer for ING Spain
about:
•	Aportar a la empresa mis conocimientos adquiridos de experiencias laborales anteriores a fin de alcanzar, tanto objetivos de la empresa como personales.

•	Desenvolverme con compromiso, seriedad y responsabilidad en el trabajo.

experience.description:
Responsible for overseeing 5 interdisciplinary teams (25 individuals) structured as follows:

2 teams dedicated to ETL processes from CORE systems for Corporate Homologation (Standardization):

GUIDEWARE extraction team - ODS

TIME (legacy) extraction team - ODS

1 team responsible for the construction of the Corporate ODS, including data model design and feasibility studies for Data Warehouse (DWH) tables and schemas.

1 team focused on the ETL-based reconnection of the new ODS architecture to feed the Corporate Data Warehouse.

1 team dedicated to data exploitation through Cubes/Tabular models/SSRS Reports/Tableau Dashboards and integration with the Microsoft suite.

Accountable for area budgets, resource projection, and estimation.

Management of vendors, tenders/bidding processes, invoice processing, and interaction with various administrative areas to manage payments.

Collaboration and review with Data Architecture and Solution Architecture departments to jointly develop proposals for process improvements.

Implementation of agile methodologies for team management, utilizing AGILE methodology and monthly SCRUM with retrospectives. Estimation using Story Points assigned to teams. Use of JIRA for tracking, information dashboards, progress monitoring, planning, projections, and backlog management.

experience.description:
Design the technological solutions required for the company's product portfolio, focusing on incorporating relevant technologies, addressing market trends and demands, and ensuring adherence to technical quality standards. Furthermore, align product development and evolution with the defined business strategy and plans.

Develop and design Information Models, data repository architectures, Data Warehouses, Data Marts, and strategies for information gathering and processing from internal and external data sources.

Research and recommend technologies and solutions related to information extraction, processing, utilization, storage, archiving, and data cleansing.

Possess a deep understanding of database systems, database design and modeling, methodologies, distributed database processing, performance, scalability, high availability, optimization, and massive data processing.

Define, document, and oversee the implementation of the defined methodology and deliverables for the data architecture practice.

element.headline: BI Engineer for ING Spain
element.about:
•	Aportar a la empresa mis conocimientos adquiridos de experiencias laborales anteriores a fin de alcanzar, tanto objetivos de la empresa como personales.

•	Desenvolverme con compromiso, seriedad y responsabilidad en el trabajo.

experience.description:
Responsible for overseeing 5 interdisciplinary teams (25 individuals) structured as follows:

2 teams dedicated to ETL processes from CORE systems for Corporate Homologation (Standardization):

GUIDEWARE extraction team - ODS

TIME (legacy) extraction team - ODS

1 team responsible for the construction of the Corporate ODS, including data model design and feasibility studies for Data Warehouse (DWH) tables and schemas.

1 team focused on the ETL-based reconnection of the new ODS architecture to feed the Corporate Data Warehouse.

1 team dedicated to data exploitation through Cubes/Tabular models/SSRS Reports/Tableau Dashboards and integration with the Microsoft suite.

Accountable for area budgets, resource projection, and estimation.

Management of vendors, tenders/bidding processes, invoice processing, and interaction with various administrative areas to manage payments.

Collaboration and review with Data Architecture and Solution Architecture departments to jointly develop proposals for process improvements.

Implementation of agile methodologies for team management, utilizing AGILE methodology and monthly SCRUM with retrospectives. Estimation using Story Points assigned to teams. Use of JIRA for tracking, information dashboards, progress monitoring, planning, projections, and backlog management.

experience.location: Buenos Aires, Buenos Aires Province, Argentina
experience.companyName: COA Tecnología de la Información Aplicada
experience.description:
Design the technological solutions required for the company's product portfolio, focusing on incorporating relevant technologies, addressing market trends and demands, and ensuring adherence to technical quality standards. Furthermore, align product development and evolution with the defined business strategy and plans.

Develop and design Information Models, data repository architectures, Data Warehouses, Data Marts, and strategies for information gathering and processing from internal and external data sources.

Research and recommend technologies and solutions related to information extraction, processing, utilization, storage, archiving, and data cleansing.

Possess a deep understanding of database systems, database design and modeling, methodologies, distributed database processing, performance, scalability, high availability, optimization, and massive data processing.

Define, document, and oversee the implementation of the defined methodology and deliverables for the data architecture practice.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Program Manager | Project Project | Product Management | Solution Architect | Scrum Master | Agile Specialist
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: December 2, 2021, Carlos Daniel was Leandro’s teacher
receivedRecommendations.description: En el último tiempo, tuve el placer de tener a Leandro como alumno en dos materias simultáneas de la carrea de Licenciatura en Gestión en la UNLZ. Leandro  y su equipo han tenido un desempeño destacado no solo en términos de lo producido sino también por su capacidad profesional y forma de conducirse a lo largo de la cursada y del proyecto, en varios los aspectos. Recomiendo ampliamente a Leanro para cualquier posicion en nuestra disciplina de IT.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Cloud Solutions Architect | Application Architect | SRE & DevOps Engineer | Software Developer | Consultant | Trainer
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: May 17, 2019, Christian Fabián worked with Leandro on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description: Leandro es un excelente profesional! Dispuesto a entregar siempre el 110% de esfuerzo. Tuve la suerte de trabajar con él definiendo la arquitectura de la Organicación y la verdad, fue muy productivo. Siempre predispuesto a escuchar y enseñar a otros para que la calidad del trabajo sea siempre mejor. Es un gran motivador y una excelente persona y profesional!

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: CDMP Associate | Data Manager | Data Architect and Business Intelligence Specialist
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: November 13, 2017, Diego Daniel reported directly to Leandro
receivedRecommendations.description:
Leandro ha sido mi líder de equipo y referente técnico a lo largo de estos 2 años en distintos proyectos BI QlikView. Durante este tiempo demostró ser una gran profesional con habilidades de gestión de equipos, proyectos, gran capacidad técnica y excelente manejo de relaciones interpersonales brindando soluciones de calidad en proyectos complejos.
Leandro es una gran profesional que siempre supo mantener la motivación de sus equipos de trabajo, crear un excelente ambiente laboral y guiar a sus compañeros en el crecimiento de sus perfiles.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Data Engineer en Inviu
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: November 9, 2017, Abdul reported directly to Leandro
receivedRecommendations.description:
Leandro posee unas habilidades comunicacionales extraordinarias y sumado a su capacidad técnica pudo establecer una excelente relación tanto con el cliente como con el equipo, lo cual se tradujo directamente en el cumplimiento de los objetivos pactados. 

Se concentra en crear un clima de colaboración entre los miembros del grupo y siempre está cuidando de las necesidades del mismo, no descuida el  desarrollo personal de cada uno.

Sin dudas un excelente Team Leader y colaborador.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Head of Analytics and Data Science
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: June 30, 2015, Fernando Raul managed Leandro directly
receivedRecommendations.description: Leandro es uno de los profesionales mas dedicados y proactivos que he conocido en mi carrera profesional. Siempre atento y pendiente de cualquier mejora que pueda implementar considero que su actitud de mejora continua lo vuelve pieza clave en cualquier organización de la cual forme parte.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: BI Visualization Engineer | Agile | Data Strategy
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: October 16, 2014, Ana Maria managed Leandro directly
receivedRecommendations.description: Leandro es una persona proactiva, responde a las inquietudes y las resuelve rapidamente. Busca soluciones. Es una persona sociable y de excelente trato con sus compañeros, se integra facilmente a los grupos de trabajo y participa activamente.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Data Specialist
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: May 14, 2014, Fabian worked with Leandro on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
Conozco a Leandro hace muchos años, y este ultimo comenzamos a trabajar juntos. Puedo destacar de él su completo compromiso para el cumplimiento de los objetivos de cada proyecto encarado. Su plena disposición para debatir y compartir conocimientos para lograr cada desarrollo en su manera mas eficiente y eficaz posible. 
Es importante no dejar de lado  su alto grado de compañerismo y su amplio conocimiento en las tareas que realiza. Ayuda demasiado a simplificar el trabajo diario.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Data Architect & DW/BI Senior Consultant
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: April 21, 2014, Ricardo managed Leandro directly
receivedRecommendations.description: Leandro es un excelente profesional, muy proactivo, con un elevado conocimiento de los procesos ETL y de las herramientas SAS.  Es una gran satisfacción el poder contar con él en nuestro equipo de DW/BI

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: BI Specialist (Advisory and Training) & Technology Teacher at Elementary (primary) School
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: April 21, 2014, Andrea worked with Leandro on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description: Leandro es un excelente analista de BI, posee altos conocimientos y  dominio de data werehouse y herramientas de BI.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Business Consultant at TGV
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: March 2, 2011, Raúl Ezequiel worked with Leandro on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description: Tuve el agrado de haber trabajado con Leandro por casi un año, es una persona muy sociable, que se integra rápidamente a cualquier grupo y hace del ambiente de trabajo un lugar mucho más divertido; y a pesar de su corta edad, es una persona muy capaz, con mucha determinación y un gran futuro por delante...

headline: Economist / Specialist in Asia Economy and Public Policy

experience.description:
China, Hong Kong, Philippines, Indonesia, Japan, Malaysia, Taiwan and Singapore. My main role is to work
closing operations with clients and stablishing cooperative alliances with suppliers in markets like China,
Taiwan, Vietnam, India, Hong Kong and Thailand. I Carry out economic analysis and reports on the Asian
domestic market, especially the Chinese market, as well as cultural understanding for business
development.
Monthly Economic Reports:
• CHINA Full year 2022 statistics report. Service Sector
• INDIA: Consumption and Productive structure
• CHINA Economic Monitoring and Analysis Center SCI International
• Asia Cross-Border Investment
• Growth of Trade Values and Volumes in Selected Food and Energy Commodities—Asia and the Pacific
• Singapore statistics reports VS Hong Kong economy financial hub
• Asia in numbers November 2022
Asia specialist researchers

experience.companyName: NATIONAL CHIEF OF CABINET OF MINISTER - GOVERNMENT
experience.description: I was the responsible for negotiation, developing and monitoring Social, financial and economic development and government affair projects with The World Bank, International Monetary Fund Interamerican Development Bank, and IFAD, International Fund for Agricultural Development. I have worked in programs like: AUH (Universal Income per Child), Smart Cities Program, Municipality Economy development program, Loans for Small and Medium enterprises program, Remediar (Health) Program, ETC.
I was responsable for a team which used to do the finantial company reporting metrics production for US, Europe and APAC.

education.schoolName: International Cooperation and Development Fund. Taiwan
education.description: The concept of OTOP (One Town One Product) is from the OVOP (One Village One Product) in Japan. OVOP Program is a community centered and demand driven regional economic development approach initiated by Oita prefecture. Since 1989, the Small and Medium Enterprise Administration (Ministry of Economic Affairs, MOEA) has been pushing forward Taiwan OTOP (One Town One Product) program to assist the growth of local cultural industries. Other countries also inspired by OVOP develop establish their own OTOP program, such as Thailand, Philippines, Malaysia, Vietnam, Cambodia, Pakistan, India, Bangladesh, and Indonesia, etc.

publications.title: El G20 y el rol de china
China’s plans for growth will help reduce global inequality
ENTREVISTA: Expertas argentinas subrayan papel de China en próxima cumbre del G20
Relación entre China y Argentina tiene grandes posibilidades de profundizarse
publications.description:
BUENOS AIRES, 19 may (Xinhua) -- La relación entre Argentina y China, dos importantes mercados emergentes, es relevante para ambas naciones, está basada en la amistad y la cooperación y cuenta con amplias posibilidades de profundizarse en diversos ámbitos.

Así lo destacaron hoy, en entrevista con Xinhua, las expertas argentinas Cecilia Peralta y Nadia Radulovich, cofundadoras de Asia Viewers, un equipo de especialistas dedicado a la investigación sobre temas relacionados con Asia.

publications.title: La economía de Taiwán en tiempos de Tsai, el desafío de crecer

Proyecto de Reactivación del Comité Nacional para Asia y el Pacífico (CONAPAC)
Fundadora de Worldenomics
publications.description:
Worldenomics es un espacio donde encontrar informacion económica de calidad de Agentina, Paises Emergentes y el Mundo es algo simple y rapido.

Somos un equipo de profesionales dedicados a monitorear y escribir de manera continua acerca de noticias y estudios económicos del mundo de las fuentes mas confiables, haciendo especial foco en Países Emergentes, Asia Pacífico e India.

education.description: The concept of OTOP (One Town One Product) is from the OVOP (One Village One Product) in Japan. OVOP Program is a community centered and demand driven regional economic development approach initiated by Oita prefecture. Since 1989, the Small and Medium Enterprise Administration (Ministry of Economic Affairs, MOEA) has been pushing forward Taiwan OTOP (One Town One Product) program to assist the growth of local cultural industries. Other countries also inspired by OVOP develop establish their own OTOP program, such as Thailand, Philippines, Malaysia, Vietnam, Cambodia, Pakistan, India, Bangladesh, and Indonesia, etc.
education.insights: Activities and societies: OTOP (One Town One Product) Program

publications.title: El G20 y el rol de china
China’s plans for growth will help reduce global inequality
ENTREVISTA: Expertas argentinas subrayan papel de China en próxima cumbre del G20
Relación entre China y Argentina tiene grandes posibilidades de profundizarse
publications.description:
BUENOS AIRES, 19 may (Xinhua) -- La relación entre Argentina y China, dos importantes mercados emergentes, es relevante para ambas naciones, está basada en la amistad y la cooperación y cuenta con amplias posibilidades de profundizarse en diversos ámbitos.

Así lo destacaron hoy, en entrevista con Xinhua, las expertas argentinas Cecilia Peralta y Nadia Radulovich, cofundadoras de Asia Viewers, un equipo de especialistas dedicado a la investigación sobre temas relacionados con Asia.

publications.description:
Worldenomics es un espacio donde encontrar informacion económica de calidad de Agentina, Paises Emergentes y el Mundo es algo simple y rapido.

Somos un equipo de profesionales dedicados a monitorear y escribir de manera continua acerca de noticias y estudios económicos del mundo de las fuentes mas confiables, haciendo especial foco en Países Emergentes, Asia Pacífico e India.

headline: Exploro y creo contenidos. Director creativo multiplataforma. Produzco general de La Cumbre Gastronómica. Hago docus audiovisuales, podcasts y videopodcasts de alta calidad.
about:
+20 años de productor integral de contenidos audiovisuales tv, podcast y digital. 

Actualmente vive en Madrid/Valencia. Head of unscripted La Maldita 

Formatos originales para: 
-Spotify (estreno septiembre 2022)
-Amazon Music (estreno noviembre 2022)  
-Podimo: Muertes en el internado, El increíble viaje del chocolate, Por qué las dietas no funcionan)

Entre 2009 y 2019 fue director artístico de la casa productora multimedia Kapow S.A. Co-creador y productor ejecutivo del show de cocina más popular de Latinoamérica, "Cocineros argentinos" (actualmente en su duodécima temporada al aire en Canal 7, TV Pública). Además participó de la venta, la asesoría y la adaptación del formato CA a EE.UU. (Cocineros latinos, Univisión) México (Cocineros mexicanos, Azteca TV), Chile (Cocineros chilenos, Chilevisión), Bolivia (Cocineros bolivianos, Reduno). 

También desarrolló los contenidos originales para www.cocinerosargentinos.com.ar, uno de los sites más populares de cocina de Hispanoamérica, con más de 10.000 recetas y secciones y 4 millones de usuarios totales mensuales. 

Participó activamente en el desarrollo de contenidos para las redes sociales de la marca Cocineros argentinos

Desarrolló formatos originales para canales líderes en Perú: “Atrévete” (con Alessandra Rampolla, Latina tv) (ejemplo de sección de programa https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sd6fisiENH0)
 “Está Cantado” (Panamericana tv), formato adaptado y emitido también en Argentina (Canal 9)(ejemplo de programa completo https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vcSTefEcSvU) Dirigió la adaptación de "Do me a favour, formato internacional" (“Haceme un favor”, Telefé)  (ejemplo prueba https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tq_1Xviyp_Q)

Junto con el chef Santiago Blondel creó la marca "La Cumbre gastronómica" (www.lacumbregastronomica.com) un encuentro de chefs en La Cumbre, Córdoba, Argentina. 

En los inicios de su carrera fue productor periodístico en Radio Universidad de Córdoba y redactor/editor internacional de WWW.INFOBAE.COM       

Co-creador Consultor internacional de formatos vendidos a Chile, Perú, Bolivia, México y EE.UU

experience.description: Co-creador y productor ejecutivo de Cocineros Argentinos emitido por la Tv Pública (Canal 7). Actualmente Cocineros Argentinos emite su temporada número 10. Cocineros es, incluso en la actualidad, el programa más exitoso de la TV Pública. Ganador de 5 premios CAPIF

experience.position: Productor y consultor de formatos de televisión
experience.description:
Asesoría y adaptación de formato en Cocineros latinos (Univisión), Cocineros mexicanos (TV Azteca), Cocineros chilenos (Chilevisión) y Cocineros bolivianos (Red Uno)

Representante de contenido televisivo para la productora internacional KAPOW S.A como director artístico en asociación con el canal líder Latina TV y Panamericana televisión (Lima Perú). Desarrollo y dirección artística de formatos: Atrévete (con Alessandra Rampolla), Campeones de la Vida (reality de competencia) y Está Cantado (talent show de música), emitido en Perú y luego en Argentina.
Producción y producción ejecutiva de varios docu-realities para el prime time de canales líderes, incluyendo Cámara Testigo (América TV), Cámara en mano (Telefé) y Adikta 3.0 (Canal 13)
Redactor y editor (nacional e internacional) de noticias en el portal de noticias líder de Latinoamérica.

headline: Talent Acquisition Specialist | Recruiter | Headhunter | Outplacement | Career Transition and Mobility | Móvil +34 601 569363 | marianoponti.86@gmail.com
about:
Desde 2010 me dedico al ámbito de los Recursos Humanos, una vocación que descubrí casi por azar y que rápidamente se transformó en propósito. Acompañar a las personas en su desarrollo y transición laboral, al tiempo que conecto a las organizaciones con el talento que necesitan, es el motor de mi trabajo.

He formado parte de equipos en consultoras líderes como Manpower, Randstad y Adecco, donde adquirí una visión integral del negocio y consolidé una red de vínculos profesionales valiosos. Mi formación en Recursos Humanos, Psicología y Coaching complementa mi enfoque y fortalece mi práctica.

Creo en el equilibrio entre resultados y sentido humano. Ese compromiso es lo que me impulsa cada día.

HERRAMIENTAS: 
BULLHORN   TALENT CLUE   EPRESELEC   TEAMTAILOR   WORKDAY   PERSONIO   SALESFORCE   HUBSPOT   ZOHO
topSkills: Recruiting • Gestión del tiempo • Inglés como lengua extranjera • Multitarea • Management

experience.location: Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description:
🔍 Comprehensive management of recruitment processes, leading every phase from identifying needs to onboarding talent.
🎯 Specialization in technical, professional, and middle & top management profiles, tailoring strategies according to the level and industry.
🤝 Outsourcing of services, working closely with companies to optimize their HR processes.
📄 Preparation of recruitment and follow-up reports, ensuring clear and effective communication with clients and candidates.
🚀 Coordination of onboarding processes, facilitating the integration of new talent and enhancing the employee experience.

experience.location: Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description:
🔍 Prospecting job opportunities – Actively searching for job openings that match candidates’ profiles across job boards, recruiters, and company networks.
💡Engaging with companies – Reaching out to businesses to understand hiring needs and promote LHH candidates.
🌐 Submitting and reinforcing candidate applications – Matching and recommending candidates to job opportunities, enhancing their chances of selection.
🕵️‍♂️ Creating reports and market insights – Developing candidate summaries, market analysis, and activity reports for internal and external use.
🤝 Supporting candidate preparation and team training – Delivering job market workshops and training new team members or interns.

experience.location: Alicante, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description:
📍 Active commercial prospecting in assigned areas, identifying opportunities and building new business relationships.
💬 Preparation of quotes and personalized negotiations, tailored to each client’s needs.
🚀 Closure and launch of recruitment processes, with ongoing follow-up and clear communication of progress.
🧠 Thorough job profiling, job postings, CV screening, and conducting phone screenings and interviews (in-person and virtual).
📄 Candidate reporting and management of psychometric and technical assessments.
📈 Follow-up on placements and vacancy fulfillment, ensuring client satisfaction and service quality.
💼 Administrative management: invoicing, payment tracking, and coordination with internal departments.

🔍 End-to-end recruitment management: From identifying client needs to finalizing hires, ensuring an excellent experience for both the company and the candidate.
🤝 B2B business development: Identifying and capturing new business opportunities through active prospecting, client visits, and market analysis.
🧠 Strategic consulting: Acting as an HR partner for clients, offering tailored solutions in talent and organizational structure.
📊 Evaluation and headhunting: Applying advanced recruitment and assessment techniques (competency-based interviews, talent mapping, direct search).
📈 Key account management (KAM): Client retention, post-placement follow-up, and development of long-term relationships.
🧾 Negotiation and deal closing: Presenting candidates, preparing offers, and closing commercial agreements with senior-level stakeholders.

🛠️ Design and management of selection processes for permanent and temporary hires, in coordination with internal departments to define guidelines and evaluation criteria.
🧪 Organization and administration of selection tests, coordination of selection panels, and participation in competency-based interviews.
🤝 Collaboration with specialized external providers, ensuring the quality and efficiency of the process.
🌟 Design and implementation of talent attraction and employer branding initiatives, strengthening the employer brand.
🎓 Support in the selection of interns for departments such as production, quality, logistics, among others.
📑 Participation in tender procedures for the contracting of key services, managing relationships with suppliers.
📊 Analysis and updating of performance indicators and dashboards, contributing to the continuous improvement of processes within the division.

📢 Recruitment: Writing and publishing job postings across multiple platforms, with proactive talent sourcing through social media, databases, and job fairs.
📞 Interviewing: Conducting phone and in-person interviews, assessing competencies and cultural fit with the organization.
🧠 Selection: Designing and applying technical and psychometric assessments, performing reference and background checks, and preparing detailed candidate reports.
🤝 Onboarding process: Coordinating final stages, negotiating offers, formalizing hires, and organizing induction and welcome sessions for new employees.
🌟 Employer branding: Participating in initiatives to strengthen the employer brand and managing relationships with all candidates—selected or not—ensuring a positive experience.

👩‍💼 Junior assistance in recruitment processes, supporting job posting, CV screening, and candidate preselection.
📞 Interview coordination: phone contact, scheduling, and follow-up with applicants.
📄 Support in temporary staff documentation management, ensuring compliance with administrative processes.
📬 Responding to employee inquiries about payroll and labor relations, providing support and guidance.

education.description:
PSYCHOLOGY DEGREE - 2022
Organizational orientation

Ontological Coaching is an emerging discipline based on the Ontology of Language, an interpretation of the human being developed by Rafael Echeverría.
It gives us options to, from learning, dissolve barriers, transcend limits and acquire those vital generic skills that allow us to access more expansive and satisfying ways of being. Through this special form of interaction, each person can articulate new and more powerful ways of interpreting their world, and achieve progress in their professional performance, and in their results as a human being.
From the Ontology of Language, it is argued that people in this millennium are experiencing a profound crisis of meaning. This crisis affects both our personal and work performance. 
The discipline of Ontological Coaching connects us with the transforming potential that allows anyone to influence their environment and themselves in order to improve in order to achieve better results.
HR Administration

receivedRecommendations.givenAt: June 13, 2025, Romina managed Mariano directly
receivedRecommendations.description:
Trabajar con Marian en Embat fue un verdadero placer! Nos acompañó en procesos de selección para personal de Hotelería y siempre lo hizo con una actitud súper positiva, energía contagiosa y muchísima proactividad.

Más allá de lo profesional —que es impecable—, lo que más destaco de él es la calidad humana. Es de esas personas con las que da gusto compartir equipo: siempre presente, con buena onda, predispuesto y con una mirada muy humana en todo lo que hace. Sé que donde esté, va a sumar muchísimo!!

headline: Master in Finance & International Law
about:
I am a legal professional with a strong academic background in both International Law and Financial Markets, currently transitioning into the finance and investment sector.

With a Master’s degree in International Law and another in Finance & Capital Markets, I bring a unique perspective that combines legal precision with financial insight—a skill set highly valuable in areas such as investment analysis, regulatory compliance, corporate finance, and financial consulting.

My legal training has sharpened my analytical thinking, attention to detail, and ability to assess risk—qualities that translate directly to roles in finance. I am passionate about financial markets, investment strategy, and sustainable finance, and I’m eager to apply my knowledge and adaptability to complex financial environments.

I am currently seeking opportunities in finance, investment analysis, regulatory compliance, and related roles, where I can leverage my multidisciplinary background to drive informed decision-making and strategic value.
topSkills: Análisis financiero • Análisis de estados financieros • Negociación

headline: Arquitecto
about:
Inicié mi formación profesional junto con mi formación académica en el año 2002.
Con el tiempo fui ganando experiencia, tomando mas responsabilidades y aceptando nuevos desafíos.
Hoy, con mas de veinte años de experiencia en los que participe en obras residenciales, retail, rehabilitaciones, etc, en donde puede desenvolverme como proyectista, documentador, Project manager, director de obra y jefe de obra, me considero como un profesional versátil y adaptable a distintas situaciones.

experience.position: Jefe de obra / Encargado de obra

experience.location: Don Torcuato, Buenos Aires Province, Argentina

experience.description: Encargado del área de coordinación de proyecto y producción de obras.
skills: Dirección y desarrollo de equipos de trabajo

experience.description:
SUPERVISOR Y DIRECTOR DE OBRA PLAN DE EXPANSIÓN Y CAMBIO DE IMAGEN DE SUCURSALES BANCO GALICIA EN TODO EL PAIS.
2012-2013: Supervisión y Dirección de obra. Sucursales CABA, Prov. Buenos Aires, Chubut y Río Negro.
2013-2014: Supervisión de proyectos, supervisión y dirección de obras de sucursales en C.A.B.A y Prov. Tierra del Fuego.
2014-2015: Supervisión de proyectos y supervisión de directores de obra en Prov. Rio Negro, Tierra del Fuego, Chubut, Jujuy.
2015-2016: Supervisión de proyectos y supervisión de obras de sucursales en C.A.B.A, Prov. de Buenos Aires, Santa Fe y Córdoba.
2016-2018: Supervisión y dirección de obras Sucursales en C.A.B.A y Prov. Buenos Aires

Desarrollo como profesional independiente.

2005 Diseño de stans comerciales “socks company”
2004-2012 Presentaciones gráficas para distintos profesionales del sector de la construcción e inmobiliario.
2008-2010 relevamiento de obras existentes y planos municipales.
Arq. Nora Bernardelo - Arq. Pedro Ganduglia.
2010-2011 Refacción de oficinas TOP SKATE. Av. de Mayo 670.
Proyecto y dirección de obra.
2011 – 2018 Proyecto y dirección de obra casas unifamiliares:
•	Departamento Av. Santa Fe y Agüero. 65 m2
•	Departamento Av. Monroe y Aispurúa, C.A.B.A. (Loft con terraza 65 m2)
•	Casa Unifamiliar en Marcos Paz, Prov. De Buenos Aires. (70 m2)
•	Departamento Laprida 1975, C.A.B.A. (78 m2)
•	Departamento Matheu 972, C.A.B.A. (75 m2)
•	Casa Unifamiliar Altolaguirre 1325, C.A.B.A. (Reestructuración + ampliación, 85 m2)
•	Casa Unifamiliar Altolaguirre 1262 (Reestructuración + ampliación, 65 m2)
•	Casa Unifamiliar Julián Alvarez 1082 (Ampliación y mejoras 30 m2 cubiertos - 60 m2 desc.)
•	Casa Unifamiliar Barrio Horizontes al Sur: (180 m2 + 80 m2 semicubiertos)

2005-2007 – Documentación técnica, cómputo y presupuesto,

headline: SRE Manager - System Architect - Unix/Linux Administrator - Security Specialist - DevOps
about:
System Architect and Unix Senior administrator, network administrator and designer, IT specialist, security administrator, Unix developer, wireless network administrator and security specialist.
I have been working in the Information Technology for the last 2 decades growing significant experience with the most relevant technologies within mission critical environments.
I am particularly good at working on my own initiative and challenging situations, particularly as a consultant on unix operating systems, volume management, storage, CI/CD and high-availability technologies.

Specialties: Programming languages: C, C++, Python, Ruby, PHP, Perl, Bash, HTML, CSS, SQL, JavaScript and Qt.

Operating systems: Solaris, HP-UX, Linux, UnixSCO, FreeBSD, OpenBSD, NetBSD and Windows.

IAAS and PAAS platforms (Design and implementation)

Network and computer security.

Penetration testing, vulnerabilities research.

Wireless networks security.

experience.description:

headline: Backend .NET Engineer | Microservices | DDD | Trilingual 🇪🇸🇫🇷🇬🇧
about: A dynamic software engineering professional with over 6 years of rich experience spanning industry and research, combining deep theoretical knowledge with hands-on expertise in microservices development using Microsoft technologies. Adept at driving feature design and managing comprehensive development cycles within agile environments. As a multilingual professional fluent in three languages, I bring a global perspective to innovative tech solutions.
topSkills: .NET Core • Software Design • Agile Methodologies • C#

experience.description:
➤ Translated business requirements into concrete API documentation for developing and updating microservices, in collaboration with the architect.
➤ Managed implementation processes to ensure timely delivery over sprints by supporting developers and maintaining quality control on PRs.
➤ Provided support through reviews and meetings with stakeholders, assisted in defining development processes and adapting methodologies, and collaborated on task division with the Product Owner.

➤ Developed various endpoints, facilitated cross-microservice communication, and conducted unit and integration testing to ensure robustness
➤ Addressed bugs and performed refactoring to enhance functionality or integration with the client application (front-end app)
➤ Engaged in thorough peer review of pull requests and collaborated with team-members through peer programming sessions

➤ Responsible for evolving and maintaining ERP systems to meet internal and external requirements, including those of third-party clients.
➤ Developed code for user stories and performed database modeling tasks during ERP evolution. Conducted development, unit testing, and integration testing phases.
➤ Managed Reporting and Data Processing module within the ERP, specializing in generating KPI queries and handling import/export files with large datasets.
➤ Integrated the government E-Invoicing Platform with the company systems to facilitate seamless operations.

➤ Intern at LIMOS Lab. of Informatics, Modelling and Optimization of Systems: Mathematical optimization applied to optical fiber networks. Development, implementation, testing and benchmarking of models for the Routing and Spectrum Assignment problem (RSA). 
Operations Research, Graph Theory, and Combinatorial Optimization.

➤ Back-end developer: Web APIs and services for Angular client app. Integrated platform to group different apps and tools for spreadsheet processing and customer management destined to client's tax business unit. 
[SQL Server 2019, .NET Core 2.2, C# 7.3, VS 2019, Azure Storage: queues, blob, databases, Azure Service Bus, Azure Functions]

experience.position: SSr Technology Consultant in STEM Team
experience.description:
➤ Software R&D: Developed Proof of Concepts and prototypes based not only on users' requirements but on new technologies, methodologies, opportunities for automation within different lines of services.
➤ Implementation of new available technologies, services and providers, libraries and models. From the technical papers reading to the potential use cases analysis and the integration into existing or in-progress developments.
➤ Coordinated with international project leaders to set requirements, practices and projects planning. Defined and created deliverables for projects’ presentations and demos to senior staff. [Slack, Google Hangouts, Slides, Docs, Microsoft Visio]
➤ Developed web application for internal Knowledge Base based on different AI and ML Techniques for text and documents processing [Python NLTK, Gensim, Word2Vec, Flask + React JS, Graph DB on Azure Cosmos DB and Neo4j, Gremlin and Cypher query languages]
➤ Developed web applications and web APIs for Speech to Text and Text to Speech tools, based on Natural Language Processing techniques. [Python, Flask, RESTPlus, Swagger, Google’s APIs, Cloud SDK, Data Storages,Virtual Machines, Linux servers, Apache 2]
➤ Helped set up SQL database and define data schemas for client projects. Created and maintained complex SQL queries to extract relevant data for analysis and optimizations. [Embedded native SQL, Entity Framework]

➤ Data consistency: Exporting, importing, merging and cleaning different datasets from eCommerce platforms, mainly products and its features. Data restructuring and completion via scripting and data processing tools. [Python scripting, pandas, Rapid Miner, Pentaho] 
➤ ML experiments: Testing of features for gender prediction and customers profiling into eCommerce platforms. [Python PANDAS, SciKit-Learn, Keras, Tensorflow, Matplotlib, Seaborn]

➤ Freelance Analyst: Process analysis and Software technical documentation.  Writing of use-cases, data sachems and diagrams for eCommerce platform project. [Google Docs, Sheets, Slides and Forms]
➤ Undergraduate final project: Web app development. Internal management and accounting system for Kindergarten. Processes analysis, documentation and deliverables, database and software architecture design, coding and deploy. [Google Docs and Ms Visio, Agile+Kanban, Razor+HTML+CSS+jQuery - ASP.NET MVC 5 C# - Entity Framework and Linq - Ms SQL Server, Windows Server 2012, Internet Informations Services]
➤ Professional Practice: Developer for Internal School Software project. Use-cases and data analysis, back and front end coding. [Microsoft Office and Visio, Google Drive, ASP.NET C# Web Forms HTML+CSS+JS, SQL Server]

receivedRecommendations.givenAt: October 24, 2024, Anaïs managed Juan Pablo directly
receivedRecommendations.description:
Juan Pablo est un élément clé et moteur au sein d'une équipe, qui n'a pas peur de s'impliquer dans les différents processus de l'entreprise.  Son feedback continu, qu'il soit sur les technologies, le métier ou les processus, a permis, en collaboration avec le produit, de faire évoluer positivement nos méthodes. 

En tant que développeur Backend, il fait preuve d'un travail de qualité et véloce. Ses compétences sur nos technologies et sa compréhension métier lui ont permis d'évoluer sur le poste de concepteur/développeur. Sur ce poste, il a démontré ses capacités à conceptualiser et à encadrer des développements malgré la complexité du métier et le nombre important de micro-services.

publications.title: Solving the routing and spectrum assignment problem, driven by combinatorial properties
A framework for routing and spectrum assignment in optical networks, driven by combinatorial properties
publications.description: The routing and spectrum assignment problem is an NP-hard problem that has received increasing attention during the last years. The majority of existing models for the problem uses edge-path formulations where variables are associated with all possible routing paths so that the number of variables grows exponentially with the size of the instance. To bypass this difficulty, precomputed subsets of all possible paths per demand are typically used, which cannot guarantee optimality of the solutions in general. Our contribution is to provide a framework for the use of edge-path formulations to minimize the spectrum width of a solution. For that, we select an appropriate subset of paths to operate on with the help of combinatorial properties in such a way that optimality of the solution can be guaranteed. Computational results indicate that our approach is indeed promising to solve the routing and spectrum assignment problem.

publications.title: Detección de comportamiento anómalo durante el monitoreo de actividades de la vida diaria en sistemas de inteligencia ambiental
publications.description: Los adultos mayores de 65 años representarán el 21.78% de la población mundial en el año 2050. Se debe garantizar a los mismos una apropiada calidad de vida a pesar del inevitable deterioro de sus capacidades cognitivas y físicas. Los sistemas de inteligencia ambiental desplegados en las viviendas de adultos mayores son una de las posibles soluciones para que los mismos puedan envejecer apropiadamente en sus residencias habituales. Las Actividades de la Vida Diaria son parámetros utilizados para estimar el nivel de autonomía e independencia de un individuo y cuya no realización supone cierto grado de discapacidad. Se describe un método para la detección de cambios en las distribuciones de probabilidad de un conjunto de actividades de la vida diaria como herramienta para la detección remota de comportamiento anómalo. La Distancia de Hellinger se emplea como métrica para cuantificar la similitud entre las distribuciones de probabilidad originales y medidas. La información suministrada por el método será analizada por un servicio de salud remoto con la intención de procurar una detección temprana de cambios en las condiciones físicas y cognitivas de los adultos monitoreados.

publications.title: Smart home simulation model for synthetic sensor datasets generation
publications.description:
World population is ageing due to longer life expectancy worldwide. There is a trend in elderly people to live alone in their habitual residences in spite of health and safety risks. Smart Homes, intelligent environment systems deployed at elderly homes can act as early warning systems trying to forecast the worsening or exacerbation of the resident chronic conditions. Access to sensor datasets is essential for the development of an efficient real smart home.
Procurement of such datasets is subject to several restrictions and difficulties. This paper describes the generation of synthetic datasets by means of a simulation model as a suitable alternative previous to the deployment of a real monitoring system. The collection of synthetic datasets will be used during the next project step to train and evaluate activity recognition methods and algorithms.

publications.title: Modelo de simulación 3D para la evaluación de Tecnologías de Monitoreo y Asistencia para Adultos Mayores
publications.description: Un proceso que se observa a escala mundial es el incremento en las expectativas de vida de la población. Estimaciones de las Naciones Unidas pronostican que la población adulta mayor a 65 años aumentará 181% entre los años 2010 al 2050. Un número significativo de adultos mayores elige vivir de manera independiente y autónoma a pesar de los riesgos y peligros asociados a residir en soledad a una edad avanzada. Las Tecnologías de Monitoreo y Asistencia para Adultos Mayores (TMAAM) comprenden aquellos dispositivos que proveen servicios compensatorios para discapacidades cognitivas, sensoriales y físicas. Se describe un modelo de simulación 3D que permite la instalación, manipulación y evaluación de redes de sensores inalámbricos en un ambiente virtual que asemeja un ambiente habitado por un adulto mayor. El modelo de simulación consta de tres componentes principales: el habitante de la residencia; la residencia simulada; redes de sensores inalámbricos. La información recolectada por los sensores se almacena en un log de eventos, a partir del cual se obtienen gráficas de producción y reportes de métricas. La utilización de un modelo de simulación como el descripto en este trabajo permite evaluar redes de sensores, el estudio de escenarios complejos o de baja probablidad, generar conjunto de datos sintéticos para la evaluación de algoritmos de reconocimiento de actividades y como medio de capacitación de profesionales de la salud y/o personal técnico.

element.headline: Backend .NET Engineer | Microservices | DDD | Trilingual 🇪🇸🇫🇷🇬🇧
element.about: A dynamic software engineering professional with over 6 years of rich experience spanning industry and research, combining deep theoretical knowledge with hands-on expertise in microservices development using Microsoft technologies. Adept at driving feature design and managing comprehensive development cycles within agile environments. As a multilingual professional fluent in three languages, I bring a global perspective to innovative tech solutions.
element.topSkills: .NET Core • Software Design • Agile Methodologies • C#

experience.description:
➤ Translated business requirements into concrete API documentation for developing and updating microservices, in collaboration with the architect.
➤ Managed implementation processes to ensure timely delivery over sprints by supporting developers and maintaining quality control on PRs.
➤ Provided support through reviews and meetings with stakeholders, assisted in defining development processes and adapting methodologies, and collaborated on task division with the Product Owner.

➤ Developed various endpoints, facilitated cross-microservice communication, and conducted unit and integration testing to ensure robustness
➤ Addressed bugs and performed refactoring to enhance functionality or integration with the client application (front-end app)
➤ Engaged in thorough peer review of pull requests and collaborated with team-members through peer programming sessions

➤ Responsible for evolving and maintaining ERP systems to meet internal and external requirements, including those of third-party clients.
➤ Developed code for user stories and performed database modeling tasks during ERP evolution. Conducted development, unit testing, and integration testing phases.
➤ Managed Reporting and Data Processing module within the ERP, specializing in generating KPI queries and handling import/export files with large datasets.
➤ Integrated the government E-Invoicing Platform with the company systems to facilitate seamless operations.

➤ Intern at LIMOS Lab. of Informatics, Modelling and Optimization of Systems: Mathematical optimization applied to optical fiber networks. Development, implementation, testing and benchmarking of models for the Routing and Spectrum Assignment problem (RSA). 
Operations Research, Graph Theory, and Combinatorial Optimization.

➤ Back-end developer: Web APIs and services for Angular client app. Integrated platform to group different apps and tools for spreadsheet processing and customer management destined to client's tax business unit. 
[SQL Server 2019, .NET Core 2.2, C# 7.3, VS 2019, Azure Storage: queues, blob, databases, Azure Service Bus, Azure Functions]

experience.position: SSr Technology Consultant in STEM Team
experience.description:
➤ Software R&D: Developed Proof of Concepts and prototypes based not only on users' requirements but on new technologies, methodologies, opportunities for automation within different lines of services.
➤ Implementation of new available technologies, services and providers, libraries and models. From the technical papers reading to the potential use cases analysis and the integration into existing or in-progress developments.
➤ Coordinated with international project leaders to set requirements, practices and projects planning. Defined and created deliverables for projects’ presentations and demos to senior staff. [Slack, Google Hangouts, Slides, Docs, Microsoft Visio]
➤ Developed web application for internal Knowledge Base based on different AI and ML Techniques for text and documents processing [Python NLTK, Gensim, Word2Vec, Flask + React JS, Graph DB on Azure Cosmos DB and Neo4j, Gremlin and Cypher query languages]
➤ Developed web applications and web APIs for Speech to Text and Text to Speech tools, based on Natural Language Processing techniques. [Python, Flask, RESTPlus, Swagger, Google’s APIs, Cloud SDK, Data Storages,Virtual Machines, Linux servers, Apache 2]
➤ Helped set up SQL database and define data schemas for client projects. Created and maintained complex SQL queries to extract relevant data for analysis and optimizations. [Embedded native SQL, Entity Framework]

➤ Data consistency: Exporting, importing, merging and cleaning different datasets from eCommerce platforms, mainly products and its features. Data restructuring and completion via scripting and data processing tools. [Python scripting, pandas, Rapid Miner, Pentaho] 
➤ ML experiments: Testing of features for gender prediction and customers profiling into eCommerce platforms. [Python PANDAS, SciKit-Learn, Keras, Tensorflow, Matplotlib, Seaborn]

➤ Freelance Analyst: Process analysis and Software technical documentation.  Writing of use-cases, data sachems and diagrams for eCommerce platform project. [Google Docs, Sheets, Slides and Forms]
➤ Undergraduate final project: Web app development. Internal management and accounting system for Kindergarten. Processes analysis, documentation and deliverables, database and software architecture design, coding and deploy. [Google Docs and Ms Visio, Agile+Kanban, Razor+HTML+CSS+jQuery - ASP.NET MVC 5 C# - Entity Framework and Linq - Ms SQL Server, Windows Server 2012, Internet Informations Services]
➤ Professional Practice: Developer for Internal School Software project. Use-cases and data analysis, back and front end coding. [Microsoft Office and Visio, Google Drive, ASP.NET C# Web Forms HTML+CSS+JS, SQL Server]

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Freelance - Directrice des Opérations, RH & Lead Product Manager
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: October 24, 2024, Anaïs managed Juan Pablo directly
receivedRecommendations.description:
Juan Pablo est un élément clé et moteur au sein d'une équipe, qui n'a pas peur de s'impliquer dans les différents processus de l'entreprise.  Son feedback continu, qu'il soit sur les technologies, le métier ou les processus, a permis, en collaboration avec le produit, de faire évoluer positivement nos méthodes. 

En tant que développeur Backend, il fait preuve d'un travail de qualité et véloce. Ses compétences sur nos technologies et sa compréhension métier lui ont permis d'évoluer sur le poste de concepteur/développeur. Sur ce poste, il a démontré ses capacités à conceptualiser et à encadrer des développements malgré la complexité du métier et le nombre important de micro-services.
