headline: Mechanical Purchases Technicians

experience.description:
. Ejecución de la estrategia de abastecimiento de las categorías mecánicas de la Compañía.
· Negociación con los proveedores para minimizar los costes de aprovisionamiento y fabricación de piezas metálicas bajo diseño.
· Mantenimiento de la relación cercana y profesional con los proveedores.
· Visitas a las instalaciones de los proveedores para potenciar las relaciones profesionales y asegurar los niveles de calidad del servicio.
· Administración de las compras y resolución de incidencias de acuerdo con los procedimientos establecidos.
· Búsqueda de oportunidades de mejora y soluciones innovadoras en el ámbito de compras que contribuyan a la mejora de resultados de la empresa.
· Colaboración con el área de Aprovisionamiento, Calidad, Logística e Ingeniería en el desarrollo de proyectos de optimización.
. Licitaciones a través de SAP ARIBA.

•	Coordinación de grupo de trabajo para obtener la mejora continua de KPI's.
•	Análisis de faltantes críticos para la fabricación de equipos.
•	Reuniones semanales con proveedores aplicando PDCA.
•	Asegurar el suministro de materiales, evitando la existencia de faltantes en la compañía.
•	Gestión de pedidos a proveedores y resolución de incidencias.
•	Control del cumplimiento de proveedores y aprovisionadores.

•	Creación y gestión de base de datos de empresas exportadoras e importadoras en CRM.
•	Análisis de precio de transporte internacional.
•	Implementación de estrategias de venta de servicios.
•	Cotización de envíos internacionales.
•	Resolución de consultas con Appsesor y gestión de incidencias.
•	Recogida de paquetes.

•	Revisión de escrituras hipotecarias, nominas, certificados de desempleo, libreta de familia, contratos de alquiler y documentación personal presentada por el cliente para acceder a la moratoria hipotecaria.
•	Calculo de ingresos y egresos para poder asistir al cliente con la prestación. 
•	Elaborar, recepcionar y archivar los documentos con orden clasificado y control.

•	Responsable comercial de la cartera de clientes de la sucursal.
•	Coordinación y supervisión del cumplimiento de objetivos del personal a cargo y de variables de medición para la sucursal en general.
•	Elaboración de informes analíticos de gestión.
•	Desarrollo de estrategias de venta para el equipo e integración de este.
•	Análisis y calificación de riesgo de clientes. 
•	Comercialización de productos crediticios para Banca Individuo y administración de líneas de descuento de cheques para Banca Empresas.
•	Gestión de Prevención de Lavado de Dinero.
•	Informar y atender al público a través de diferentes vías garantizando su satisfacción.

•	Responsable de apertura y cierre del tesoro. 
•	Encargado del pedido y administración de remesas, balanceo de ATM (cajeros automáticos) y terminales de autoconsulta.
•	Analizar y reportar desviaciones, incidencias y puntos de mejora.
•	Realizar propuestas para implementar nuevas políticas y medidas de control.
•	Elaborar previsiones de tesorería a corto, medio y largo plazo.
•	Controlar y comunicar de manera diaria la posición de tesorería.
•	Controlar y ejecutar los procesos de pagos, y monitorizar el saldo del tesoro.
•	Gestionar la relación con las entidades financieras.
•	Garantizar el registro y trazabilidad de las operaciones, optimizar el proceso y herramientas de registro de la información.
•	Transmisión de cheques, pedido y administración de fórmulas de plazo fijo y cheques de mostrador.
•	Gestión de biblioratos para auditorias, arqueos de cajas semanales
sorpresivos, arqueos de tesoro diarios por lomeo y quincenales integrales.

•	Análisis y gestión de hipotecas/préstamos.
•	Tramitación bancaria.
•	Gestión del proceso de firma en notaria.
•	Servicio post-venta.

•	Comercialización de préstamos, tarjetas de créditos, seguros de vida, hogar, autos, etc.
•	Realización de vinculaciones en cuentas, otorgamiento de adicionales de tarjetas de crédito y débito.
•	Constitución y renovación de plazos fijos.

•	Realizar propuestas para implementar nuevas políticas y medidas de control.
•	Elaborar previsiones de tesorería a corto, medio y largo plazo.
•	Controlar y comunicar de manera diaria la posición de tesorería.
•	Controlar y ejecutar los procesos de pagos, y monitorizar el saldo del tesoro.
•	Gestionar la relación con las entidades financieras.
•	Garantizar el registro y trazabilidad de las operaciones, optimizar el proceso y herramientas de registro de la información.
•	Transmisión de cheques, pedido y administración de fórmulas de plazo fijo y cheques de mostrador.
•	Gestión de biblioratos para auditorias, arqueos de cajas semanales
sorpresivos, arqueos de tesoro diarios por lomeo y quincenales integrales.

•	Análisis y gestión de hipotecas/préstamos.
•	Tramitación bancaria.
•	Gestión del proceso de firma en notaria.
•	Servicio post-venta.

•	Comercialización de préstamos, tarjetas de créditos, seguros de vida, hogar, autos, etc.
•	Realización de vinculaciones en cuentas, otorgamiento de adicionales de tarjetas de crédito y débito.
•	Constitución y renovación de plazos fijos.

experience.position: Administrativo de Compras y Recursos Humanos
experience.description:
•	Gestionar la negociación y mantenimiento de más de 30 proveedores.
•	Realizar la gestión de compras de materiales.
•	Analizar periódicamente los precios de mercado de las materias primas.
•	Seguimiento de los pagos a proveedores.
•	Control de la calidad de las materiales.
•	Supervisar la gestión documental que acompaña a cada compra.
•	Controlar el stock real de materia prima en la organización.
•	Creación de pedidos de compra.
•	Resolución de incidencias en el servicio: plazos, calidad de los materiales.
•	Comunicación constante con proveedores internacionales.

•	Extracciones y depósitos en cuentas, 
•	Pagos y depósitos de cheques, jubilaciones, pensiones y usuras pupilares.
•	Cobro de facturas.
•	Transferencias bancarias.
•	Aprendizaje considerable del vocabulario, interpretación, escritura y habla en inglés.
•	Aprendizaje considerable del vocabulario, interpretación, escritura y habla en inglés.

headline: Type designer and developer
about:
I am a hands-on mentality visual designer and frontend developer who loves typography. I have an entrepreneurial approach to my work and a passion for solving complex problems with simple, creative, and user-centered tools.

I am co-founder and currently work in Debi as chief of product. I also design fonts at Huerta Tipográfica, mainly for Google Fonts.

experience.description:
Fintech startup offering payment technology that enables small and large companies to accept bank-to-bank and automatic payments. 
Backend and frontend development. Branding and UI designer.

Independent Type Foundry
Project management, type design and production of latin, greek, cyrillic and devanagari fonts. Web development and programming of open source type-technology related projects.
Head professor of Typography 1 (basic typography) at the Graphic Design Program. National University of Cuyo (UNCuyo). Faculty of Arts and Design
Head professor of Type Design Systems at the Graphic Design Program. National University of Cuyo (UNCuyo). Faculty of Arts and Design.

experience.location: Buenos Aires, Buenos Aires Province, Argentina
experience.description: Lecturer of Type Design at the Master in Type Design. Postgraduate course held in the University of Buenos Aires (UBA). Head professor in charge: Alejandro Lo Celso.

Brand design studio. Co-founder:
Direction and project management. Graphic design, UI design and web development.
Visiting Professor at the Type Design Speciality. Postgraduate course held in the University of Buenos Aires (UBA). Head professor in charge: Rubén Fontana.
Lecturer of Typography and Foundations of Typography at the Visual Design Program. National University of Río Negro (UNRN). Head professor in charge: Alejandro Lo Celso

Graduate Assistant in Typography II (book and publication design) at the Graphic Design Program. National University of Cuyo (UNCuyo). Faculty of Arts and Design.
Head professor in charge: María Teresa Bruno

Graphic design studio specialized in branding and directed by Rubén Fontana and Zalma Jalluf.
Graphic design, book and web design, among others.

education.description: Type Design Specialist University of Buenos Aires (UBA) . Faculty of Architecture, Design and Urbanism. 2-year type design postgraduate program.
Graphic Design National University of Cuyo (UNCuyo), Faculty of Arts and Design. 5-year design program.

headline: Junior Recruiter / Talent Acquisition Jr
about:
💼 With over 3 years of experience leading end-to-end recruitment processes, I’ve helped improve candidate pipelines, optimize hiring workflows, and strengthen talent and growth strategies across the companies I've worked with.

🚀 I’m passionate about innovation, efficiency, and automation. Since the pandemic, I’ve proactively studied programming 💻, data analysis 📊, and AI-powered automation tools, boosting my capabilities in data visualization, candidate tracking, and automating manual recruiting tasks.

🗣 Bilingual in English and Spanish. Skilled in sourcing candidates through professional social networks and job boards. Known for my communication and active listening skills, I bring a strong sense of collaboration, service orientation, and adaptability to every team I join.

experience.location: Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description:
Since joining Young Media, I co-built the Recruitment & HR area in a startup environment that values autonomy, improvement, and innovation. My role focused on automation, recruitment operations, and turning data into strategic insights.

⚙️ Process design & automation
🔹Rebuilt and normalized the candidate database in Google Sheets, adding structure by location, seniority, stage, and suitability.
🔹Connected WordPress with Sheets to centralize applications.
🔹Automated workflows with Apps Script: rejection emails, job proposals in Docs, supervisor reminders, and GDPR consent requests.
🔹Built scripts to keep data clean and scalable.
🔹Integrated with Power BI, providing real-time dashboards for KPI tracking and pipeline insights.

🎯 Talent recruitment
🔹Standardized sourcing processes and outreach templates across LinkedIn Recruiter and other platforms.
🔹Conducted bilingual interviews (EN & ES) for roles from junior to managerial.
🔹Delivered candidate reports with insights that supported hiring decisions.

📢 Job posting & vacancy standardization
🔹Led kick-off meetings with hiring managers to align requirements.
🔹Created templates for messaging, forms, and job descriptions.
🔹Published postings across LinkedIn, Indeed, job boards, academic networks, and WordPress, boosting reach and visibility.

🌐 WordPress site management
🔹Managed the Young Talents site, linking posts with LinkedIn to drive traffic.
🔹Integrated the backend with Sheets to streamline candidate flow.
🔹Improved usability and branding with custom code updates.

📊 Reporting & follow-up
🔹Designed weekly/monthly reports with key pipeline metrics for leadership.
🔹Built tools to track equipment and manage signed agreements, improving compliance.

experience.location: Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description:
Valencia Volley started as an initiative within the DAME community, aiming to create a space for connection, sport, and fun for people from all over the world living in or passing through Valencia.

Every weekend, we organize beach volleyball events with a consistent attendance of 80 to 100 participants. Today, Valencia Volley has a community of over 1,000 volleyball enthusiasts, connected through social media and dedicated groups.

We promote healthy competition, respect, and empathy, creating a safe and inclusive environment for those who love volleyball and meaningful human connections.

📲 Check us out on Instagram: @valenciavolley

element.headline: Junior Recruiter / Talent Acquisition Jr
element.about:
💼 With over 3 years of experience leading end-to-end recruitment processes, I’ve helped improve candidate pipelines, optimize hiring workflows, and strengthen talent and growth strategies across the companies I've worked with.

🚀 I’m passionate about innovation, efficiency, and automation. Since the pandemic, I’ve proactively studied programming 💻, data analysis 📊, and AI-powered automation tools, boosting my capabilities in data visualization, candidate tracking, and automating manual recruiting tasks.

🗣 Bilingual in English and Spanish. Skilled in sourcing candidates through professional social networks and job boards. Known for my communication and active listening skills, I bring a strong sense of collaboration, service orientation, and adaptability to every team I join.

experience.location: Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description:
Since joining Young Media, I co-built the Recruitment & HR area in a startup environment that values autonomy, improvement, and innovation. My role focused on automation, recruitment operations, and turning data into strategic insights.

⚙️ Process design & automation
🔹Rebuilt and normalized the candidate database in Google Sheets, adding structure by location, seniority, stage, and suitability.
🔹Connected WordPress with Sheets to centralize applications.
🔹Automated workflows with Apps Script: rejection emails, job proposals in Docs, supervisor reminders, and GDPR consent requests.
🔹Built scripts to keep data clean and scalable.
🔹Integrated with Power BI, providing real-time dashboards for KPI tracking and pipeline insights.

🎯 Talent recruitment
🔹Standardized sourcing processes and outreach templates across LinkedIn Recruiter and other platforms.
🔹Conducted bilingual interviews (EN & ES) for roles from junior to managerial.
🔹Delivered candidate reports with insights that supported hiring decisions.

📢 Job posting & vacancy standardization
🔹Led kick-off meetings with hiring managers to align requirements.
🔹Created templates for messaging, forms, and job descriptions.
🔹Published postings across LinkedIn, Indeed, job boards, academic networks, and WordPress, boosting reach and visibility.

🌐 WordPress site management
🔹Managed the Young Talents site, linking posts with LinkedIn to drive traffic.
🔹Integrated the backend with Sheets to streamline candidate flow.
🔹Improved usability and branding with custom code updates.

📊 Reporting & follow-up
🔹Designed weekly/monthly reports with key pipeline metrics for leadership.
🔹Built tools to track equipment and manage signed agreements, improving compliance.

experience.location: Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description:
Valencia Volley started as an initiative within the DAME community, aiming to create a space for connection, sport, and fun for people from all over the world living in or passing through Valencia.

Every weekend, we organize beach volleyball events with a consistent attendance of 80 to 100 participants. Today, Valencia Volley has a community of over 1,000 volleyball enthusiasts, connected through social media and dedicated groups.

We promote healthy competition, respect, and empathy, creating a safe and inclusive environment for those who love volleyball and meaningful human connections.

📲 Check us out on Instagram: @valenciavolley

- Customer Service (ENG & ESP)
- Communication and Teamwork
- Adaptability and Stress Managements
- Organization and Time Management
- Handling Complaints and Initiative
- Drink Preparation (Bartender) -- Latte Art -- Cash Management -- Kitchen

- Hunting and attraction of Generalist and IT profiles through social networks.
- End to end hiring process
- Employer branding
- Database building, managing and reporting
- Stategic Talent Sourcing
- Hybrid teamwork
- Contact and feedback with stakeholders: Job boards, consulting firms, universities, educational institutions.
